headline: Devon Energy price target raised to $50 from $42 at Roth Capital
summary: Roth Capital analyst Nick Pope raised the firm’s price target on Devon Energy (DVN) to $50 from $42 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The company reported a solid Q4 with strong oil production led by the Delaware Basin asset, the analyst tells investors in a research note.President's Day Sale - 70% OffUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential Publi
